Policy: Mwanza Municipal Council (Planting and Conservation of Trees and Forests) (Amendment) By-laws, 1993 (G.N. No. 196 of 1994).
Policy_Content: The amendments concern definitions (by-law 3), the obligation of villages to set aside land for a forest reserve (by-law 4), forest fires (by-laws 5-6), offences and enforcement (by-laws 7-14). (15 by-laws)
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Least Developed Countries

Policy: Ley Nº 24.196 - Ley de inversiones mineras.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley instituye un régimen de inversiones para la actividad minera, al cual podrán acogerse las personas físicas domiciliadas en Argentina y las personas jurídicas constituidas en ella, o que estén habilitadas para actuar dentro de su territorio. Las actividades comprendidas por dicho régimen incluyen la prospección, exploración, desarrollo, preparación y extracción de sustancias minerales que se hallen comprendidas en el Código de Minería. El artículo 23 introduce una disposición particular en tema de conservación del medio ambiente: a efectos de prevenir y subsanar las alteraciones ambientales eventualmente ocasionadas por la actividad minera, las empresas deberán constituir una previsión especial para tal fin. La Ley consta de los siguientes capítulos: (I) Ambito de aplicación; (II) Alcances; (III) Actividades comprendidas; (IV) Tratamiento fiscal de las inversiones ; (V) Importaciones ; (VI) Regalías ; (VII) Conservación del medio ambiente ; (VIII) Autoridad de aplicación ; (IX) Disposiciones reglamentarias ; (X) Disposiciones transitorias.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South Atlantic

Policy: Regulation No. 231 on refusal of ownership or possession of land and concerning requests to return land.
Policy_Content: This Regulation concerns the refusal to own or possess land. There are hereby regulated the procedures appicable to requests for land. The land above-mentioned is considered to be State-owned land to be administered and distributed by the Ministry of Agriculture and Food. The refusal must be in written form and submitted to the village land distribution committee. Refusal of the land from village families does not affect their entitlement to social aid, whereas the refusal from agriculture enterprises families render the family ineligible for social aid.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Regulation No. 151 amending and supplementing Regulation No. 230 of 1991 on the establishment of land commissions.
Policy_Content: This Regulation lays down certain amendments and addenda to Regulation No. 230 of 1991 on the establishment of land commissions, with respect to their composition. The commissions shall be composed of the directors of agricultural and food departments at the regional level, chiefs of the immovable property registration offices, representative of the Ministry of Interior and other members such as agronomists, lawyers and economists. The commissions takes collegial decisions with simple majority.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Unlawfully Expropriated Property Valuation and Compensation Act (1993)
Policy_Content: The Act determines the bases and procedure for valuation of unlawfully expropriated property being the object of ownership reform and the method and extent of compensation thereof. The bases and procedure for valuation of unlawfully expropriated land and the natural objects attached thereto and collectivised property, and the method and extent of compensation thereof must be determined by separate Acts. The value of property at the time of expropriation must be determined in case of compensation for property if property is not subject to return according to subsection 12 (3) of the Republic of Estonia Principles of Ownership Reform Act; property has been destroyed; on the basis of subsection 12 (2) of the Republic of Estonia Principles of Ownership Reform Act, a person to whom the property is returned must pay compensation to other entitled subjects and an agreement specified in subsection 11 (1) of this Act has not been reached with regard to the size, method and procedure of payment and other conditions of the compensation; and property consists of stocks or share certificates. According to the Act, the value of property at the time of expropriation can be supported by documents issued not earlier than three years and not later than six months as of the moment of unlawful expropriation. In case of several documents issued within the given term, the document issued closest to the moment of unlawful expropriation of property shall be preferred in case of other equal circumstances.
Subject: Land & soil
Keyword: Expropriation,Liability/compensation,Procedural matters,Ownership,Land reform,Private land,Property rights,Public land,Contract/agreement,Resource/damage valuation,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Land valuation
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Northern Europe

Policy: Ordinance by the regional government of Styria  issuing a development programme for air pollution control.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Styria Land Use Planning Law 1974 (LGBl. No. 127). Article 1 establishes that the development programme for air pollution control shall be a model for the planning and implementation of concepts to improve air quality, as well as for air quality monitoring in all parts of Styria. The text consists of 4 articles.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Western Europe

Policy: Plant Health (Forestry) (Great Britain) Order 1993 (S.I. No. 1283 of 1993).
Policy_Content: This Order implements the following Community legislation on: protective measures against the introduction into the Member States of the European Community of organisms harmful to plants or plant products and against their spread within the Community; protected zones exposed to particular health risks in the Community; obligations to which producers and importers of plants, plant products or other objects are subject and establishing details for their registration; and standardization for plant passports to be used for the movement of certain plants, plant products or other objects within the Community, and establishing the detailed procedures related to the issuing of such plant passports and the conditions and detailed procedures for their replacement. The Order, inter alia: (a) prohibits the landing of specified tree pests and relevant material and lays down the conditions under which the landing of other relevant material may be permitted (art. 3), (b) prohibits the introduction into protected zones of specified tree pests and relevant material and lays down the conditions under which the introduction of other relevant material may be permitted (art. 4); (c) prohibits the keeping, storage, sale, planting, movement or other disposal of specified tree pests and relevant material within Great Britain (art. 5); (d) prohibits the keeping, storage, sale, planting, movement or other disposal of specified relevant material in protected zones (art. 6); and (e) lays down the conditions under which specified relevant material may be consigned to another Member State or to a protected zone outside Great Britain (art. 7).
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe
Entry into force notes: Coming into force on 1 June 1993.

Policy: Land Consolidation Act Implementing Law.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Land Consolidation Act in its version of 16 March 1976. In particular, the Ordinance appoints the various authorities and offices responsible for the efficient enforcement of the afore-mentioned Act. The text consists of 4 articles.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Ministerial Decree No. 11824 establishing special measures for the assessment of ambient air pollution in the area of the city of Athens.
Policy_Content: The Decree aims at assessing in a satisfactory manner the emergency situations deriving from ambient air pollution in the city of Athens and the wider area so as to ensure that appropriate measures are taken in order to avoid adverse effects on human health and the environment, which might arise from the ambient concentrations of certain pollutants. The Decree is composed as follows: definitions (level of ambient air pollution, limit values for pollution, etc.(art. 1); determination of pollutants to be monitored (art. 2); levels of actions (art.3); limit values for air pollutants (art. 4); establishment of a timeline for the levels of actions to be applied (art. 5); duration of levels of action (art. 6); content of the various levels of action (art. 7); obligation of industries (art. 8); sanctions (art. 9).
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: The Decree shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Règlement grand-ducal portant application de la directive 92/72 CEE du Conseil du 21 septembre1992 concernant la pollution de l'air par l'ozone.
Policy_Content: Le susdit règlement grand-ducal porte application de la directive 92/72 CEE du Conseil du 21 septembre1992 concernant la pollution de l'air par l'ozone. Il a pour objet d'établir pour l'application de la susdite directive 92/72 une procédure: de surveillance, d'échange d'informations, d'information et d'alerte de la population en ce qui concerne la pollution de l'air par l'ozone afin de permettre une connaissance plus large sur cette forme de pollution de l'air au niveau national et communautaire, d'optimiser les actions nécessaires pour réduire la formation d'ozone et de garantir une information minimale du public en cas de dépassement des seuils de concentration, tels que visés aux points 3 et 4 de l'annexe I. Le texte comprend 7 articles. Cinq annexes sont jointes.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Keyword: Pollution control,Air quality/air pollution,Ozone layer,Data collection/reporting,Inspection
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Mining Act (Act No. XLVIII of 1993).
Policy_Content: This Act provides for the prospecting of mineral raw materials, and for the exploration and exploitation of mineral resources.
Subject: Mineral resources, Water
Geographical_area: Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries
Entry into force notes: First entry of this Act was on 12 June 1993. The last consolidated version of the Act entered into force on 9 May 2015.

Policy: Regional, Charcoal and Redevelopment Planning Law.
Policy_Content: The present Law lays down provisions relating to a general regional land use planning, a charcoal planning and restructuring planning. Such activities shall be carried out with a view to attain a sustainable development and, in particular, to restrain their impact on the environment. Article 14 of the Ordinance establishes the Charcoal Committee of the Land Brandenburg whose headquarters shall be in Cottbus. Its main function shall be to render acceptable to public opinion the exploitation of charcoal. The text consists of 22 articles divided into 3 Parts as follows: Regional planning (1); Charcoal planning and redevelopment planning (2); Final provisions (3).
Subject: Energy, Land & soil, Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy_Content: Ce décret porte attributions et organisation du Ministère de l'agriculture et de la réforme agraire.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Land & soil
Geographical_area: Africa, Mediterranean, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, North Atlantic, Northern Africa

Policy: Resolución Legislativa Nº 26185 - Aprueba la Convención Marco de Naciones Unidas sobre el Cambio Climático.
Policy_Content: La presente Resolución Legislativa aprueba la Convención Marco de las Naciones Unidas sobre Cambio Climático, adoptada en Nueva York el 9 de mayo de 1992 y suscrita por el Perú en Río de Janeiro el 12 de junio de 1992. "Artículo 2º: El objetivo último de la presente Convención y de todo instrumento jurídico conexo que adopte la Conferencia de las Partes, es lograr, de conformidad con las disposiciones pertinentes de la Convención, la estabilización de las concentraciones de gases de efecto invernadero en la atmósfera a un nivel que impida interferencias antropógenas peligrosas en el sistema climático. Ese nivel debería lograrse en un plazo suficiente para permitir que los ecosistemas se adapten naturalmente al cambio climático, asegurar que la producción de alimentos no se vea amenazada y permitir que el desarrollo económico prosiga de manera sostenible."
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Act on government guarantee for farming debt- rescheduling (No. 268 of 1993).
Policy_Content: This Act provides regulations on loan guarantees for debt rescheduling through the Danish Agriculture Mortgage Fund. Farmers shall be granted such loans on the basis of a 15-year nominal interest rate cash or on a 15-year inflation-indexed rate. The Minister of Agriculture approves Danish Agricultural Mortgage Fund fee rates of loans qualifying for warranty under this Act. Applicants for this loan are required to operate in agriculture as main occupation, to have a total total debt amounting to at least 70% of the total asset, and that can prove any re-prioritization of inflation-indexed and any creditor scheme applied is economically viable.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe
Entry into force notes: The Minister of Agriculture will determine date of entry into force of this Act.

Policy: Guidelines for the Allocation of Land in accordance with Decision 327-CT.
Policy_Content: These guidelines are issued by the General Department for Land Management concerning utilization of bare land, degraded hills, forests, alluvial flats and water bodies. The approval of land use projects will be based on the economic-technical viability of the project with the objectives of good land management and sustainable land use. The project implementing agency shall classify the land depending on the objectives of the project and the land available. Land should be used in accordance with plans made, the land should be protected and the fertility of the soil improved. Duties of land management authorities include implementation of land allocation for different projects, guidance of participating communes, drawing of administrative maps, creation of land registration documents and preparation of land use certificates. Land management units will cooperate with other bodies (planning, forestry, etc.) in guiding and implementing land management projects from the initiation of the project to the preparation and issuing of the land use certificates.
Subject: Land & soil, Water
Geographical_area: Asia, East Asian Seas, South-Eastern Asia

Policy: Regulation No. 115 of the Federal Forest Service regarding main use felling in the mountain forests of the Northern Caucasus.
Policy_Content: This Regulation stipulates that mountain forests of the Northern Caucasus shall be considered forests located within mountain system and separate mountain ranges with elevations of over 100 metres and average down gradient over five degrees. Felling must ensure: (a) the continuous, sustainable and rational use of forest resources; (b) maximum conservation of the forest’s water soil protection functions; (c) prevention of soil erosion; (d) reforestation; and (e) improvement of forest health. Timber extraction in water conservation areas shall be conducted on a15-20 year cycle. Timber shall be transported via aerial ropeway and other aerial means.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Ordonnance ministérielle nº 710/180 de mise en application du décret nº 100/94 portant création des directions provinciales et des cellules communales de développement de l'agriculture et de l'élevage.
Policy_Content: Cette ordonnance met en application le décret qui porte création des directions provinciales et des cellules communales de développement de l'agriculture et de l'élevage. Elle fixe les attributions du directeur provincial de l'agriculture et de l'élevage et les missions des différents cellules et modules de la direction provinciale, ainsi que les relations hierarchiques et fonctionnelles entre ces organismes.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Eastern Africa, Landlocked Developing Countries, Least Developed Countries

Policy_Content: This Act establishes - through the Ministry of Food, Agriculture and Fisheries - rules in regards to the keeping of records for plant protection against pests, weeds and other undesirable plants, and for wilting and growth regulation in plant cultures by farm owners and operators.
